text: Janine Sutto (20 April 1921 – 28 March 2017) was a French-born Canadian actress. She was born in Paris, but raised in Montreal. In 1943, she was a founding member of the Théâtre de l'Equipe troupe and continued acting on stage through the early 1950s with Théâtre du Nouveau Monde. Sutto was known for her roles in Kamouraska, Congorama, and in Route 132. Sutto died in Montreal on 28 March 2017. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Janine Sutto at The Canadian Encyclopedia Category:1921 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Quebec Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Montreal Category:Actors from Paris
title: Janine Sutto
